name: They See me Whalin, they Hatin!
author: Seth Hydra

notes.text: Didn't really want to try KoG'ing up this season because I've had a horrible time with Geargias and Heros on the ladder, but I changed my mind after getting my second copy of Abyss Soldier who is by far the most valuable monster in this deck. Bouncing off set Komoshroomo, that turn one Dakini/Safira and set gears was crucial in putting the opponent at a disadvantage, not to mention getting Citadel Whale and Fishborg in the grave meant I had some decent grave setup. The second best card in terms of impact was Ultimate providence which if you managed to get out first turn meant Sylvans and Gears basically lost their first turn play, not to mention opposing Citadel whales. This deck is still by no means perfect and would probably get massacred if run in early season, but that's not to see that it's also one of the most fun decks I've had the pleasure of playing with in recent months.
